policy.title: Refund Policy
policy.company: Jardiper S.C. - Carretera A131, km 1.8 S/N, Fraga, 22520, Spain

rules.rule1: Maximum 1 week (7 days) from payment to request refund
rules.rule2: Maximum 15 days for payment errors (annual instead of monthly)
rules.rule3: Must not have used the maximum plan limits
rules.rule4: Refund can only be made for the current month (for monthly payments)
rules.rule5: There must be a serious demonstrable issue with the application
rules.rule6: Refund only applies to the current billing period. For more information, contact support@layersuite.com

hero.title: About Layer Suite
hero.subtitle: The complete solution to manage and optimize your 3D printing business

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Layer Suite was born from the need to simplify 3D printing business management. Our goal is to provide entrepreneurs and professionals with the tools needed to calculate costs accurately, manage inventories efficiently, and grow their businesses sustainably.

calculator.title: Price Calculator
calculator.description: Automatically calculate the cost of your prints considering materials, electricity and print time

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Maintain complete control of your materials, stock and inventory movements in real time

projects.title: Project Management
projects.description: Organize all your printing projects, materials used and print configurations

dashboard.title: Analytical Dashboard
dashboard.description: View detailed statistics of your orders, prints and business performance

orders.title: Order Management
orders.description: Manage customer orders with complete status tracking and visual organization

catalogs.title: Digital Catalogs
catalogs.description: Create and share professional catalogs of your products with customers (Premium feature)

security.title: Security and Privacy
security.description: Your data is protected with best security practices. We respect your privacy and never share your information.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We designed Layer Suite to be intuitive and easy to use. You don't need advanced technical knowledge to take advantage of all its features.

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.description: We listen to our users and constantly improve the platform with new features and optimizations.

community.title: Community
community.description: We are part of a community of entrepreneurs who share a passion for 3D printing and growing their businesses.

creator.title: Who I Am
creator.name: Carlos Peralta Sorolla
creator.experience: With more than 5 years of experience in the gaming industry, I have worked in project management, creative direction and leadership of multidisciplinary technical teams, collaborating on the development of Web3 and Web2 video games.
creator.story1: The story of Layer Suite began personally: when I acquired my Bambu Lab P2S 3D printer and started managing my own business, I realized I needed a tool to manage my stock, materials and orders efficiently. So I created an application for personal use.
creator.story2: Seeing that it really solved a real problem in the industry and could help other entrepreneurs and professionals in the sector, I decided to share it with the world. Layer Suite is the result of combining my technical experience with the real needs I discovered in my own day-to-day.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join our community and start optimizing your 3D printing business today

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using Layer Suite, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you should not use this service.

section2.title: Service Description
section2.content: Layer Suite is a business management platform designed to help 3D printing entrepreneurs manage their materials, projects, price calculator and orders.

section3.title: Registration and User Account
section3.intro: To use certain features of the service, you must register and create an account. You agree to:
section3.item1: Provide accurate, current and complete information during the registration process
section3.item2: Maintain and update your information to keep it accurate and complete
section3.item3: Maintain the security of your password and accept all responsibility for activities under your account
section3.item4: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

section4.title: Acceptable Use
section4.intro: You agree NOT to use the service to:
section4.item1: Violate any applicable law or regulation
section4.item2: Infringe the intellectual property rights of third parties
section4.item3: Transmit offensive, defamatory or illegal content
section4.item4: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to other systems or networks
section4.item5: Interfere with the normal operation of the service

section5.title: Plans and Payments
section5.content: Layer Suite offers different subscription plans. The prices and features of each plan are detailed on our pricing page. Payments are processed securely through our authorized payment providers.

section6.title: Intellectual Property
section6.content: All content, features and functionality of the service (including but not limited to information, software, text, graphics, logos) are the exclusive property of Jardiper S.C. and are protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws.

section7.title: Privacy and Data Protection
section7.content: Your privacy is important to us. We collect, use and protect your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in that policy.

section8.title: Limitation of Liability
section8.content: Layer Suite is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure or error-free. In no event shall we be liable for indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the service.

section9.title: Cancellation and Termination
section9.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the service if you violate these terms or for any other reason we deem appropriate.

section10.title: Modifications to Terms
section10.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on our service. Continued use of the service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

section11.title: Contact
section11.content: If you have questions about these Terms and Conditions, you can contact us at support@layersuite.com. Jardiper S.C., Carretera A131, km 1.8 S/N, Fraga, 22520, Spain.

section12.title: Refund Policy
section12.content: Jardiper S.C. offers refunds under the following conditions:
section12.item1: Maximum 1 week (7 days) from payment to request a refund
section12.item2: Maximum 15 days for payment errors (annual instead of monthly)
section12.item3: Must not have used the maximum limits of the plan
section12.item4: Refund can only be made for the current month (for monthly payments)
section12.item5: There must be a serious demonstrable issue with the application
section12.item6: Refund only applies to the current billing period. For more information, contact support@layersuite.com
